document_data.name: Hermuk
document_data.mainbody: '''Hermuk''' is a [[thief]] who operates [[Hermuk's Allgoods]] in the city of [[Melvaunt]]. He is a well-conected man within the regions black market, with the ability to obtain a varied and exotic selection of items including illegal poisons.
